dict.string: Get real-time crypto news from 130+ trusted sources

# Free Crypto News Alfred Workflow
Get crypto news directly from Alfred.
## Keywords
- `cn` - Latest news - `cn breaking` - Breaking news - `cn bitcoin` - Bitcoin news - `cn defi` - DeFi news - `cn search [query]` - Search news - `cn trending` - Trending topics
## Actions
- Press Enter to open in browser - Press Cmd+C to copy link
